title: [Large-scale] Digital Technology-Enhanced Hansen’s Disease Education Capacity-Building Program

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational Medical and Public Health Concepts
context.additional_context: Hansen’s disease educational professional development program combining smartphone-based digital platforms with offline workshops

learning_goals: Explain the epidemiology, transmission routes, and diagnostic criteria of Hansen’s disease

Learners can analyze three Hansen's disease patient management cases using digital simulation tools (e.g., SimX, Body Interact) and submit a project report (symptom evaluation, treatment planning, infection control strategies) with over 80% completeness.

Learners can collect feedback from peers at least three times using smartphone-based collaborative platforms (e.g., Google Docs, Notion) and produce one educational content piece (video or PDF) in the medical/nursing field reflecting the feedback. The content must meet at least four out of five checklist items provided by the institution.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
